H0.text: Need to consume plant matter is the best explanation of why carnivores are dependent on plants.

H1.text: Use plants for shelter is the best explanation of why carnivores are dependent on plants.

H2.text: Need carbon dioxide released by plants is the best explanation of why carnivores are dependent on plants.

H3.text: Consume other animals that eat plants is the best explanation of why carnivores are dependent on plants.

A4.text: Higher trophic levels cannot produce their own energy and so must consume producers or other life that itself consumes producers.

A5.text: Secondary consumers eat and obtain energy from primary consumers, tertiary consumers eat and obtain energy from secondary consumers, etc.
